title: 1.11.2告示牌右击触发命令
author: Yusai
txt_content:
一日两贴，
依旧如题，
                                                       最好能有个例子.

replies.author: 极光战神伍
replies.txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ standing_sign 0 replace {Text1:"{\"text\":\"获得\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"give @p minecraft:diamond_helmet 1 0\"}}",Text2:"{\"text\":\"一套\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"give @p minecraft:diamond_chestplate 1 0\"}}",Text3:"{\"text\":\"钻石\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"give @p minecraft:diamond_leggings 1 0\"}}",Text4:"{\"text\":\"护甲\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"give @p minecraft:diamond_boots 1 0\"}}"}

红字为告示牌文本
蓝字为执行的命令
文本分了四行，执行的命令可以一次执行四个。
若是只想执行一次命令，只剩一个蓝字部分即可。

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
我给你一个例子你研究研究
/give @p sign 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{Text1:"{"text":"1.钻石头盔","color":"blue","bold":true,"underlined":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"give @p minecraft:diamond_helmet 1 0"}}",Text2:"{"text":"2.钻石胸甲","color":"blue","bold":true,"underlined":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"give @p minecraft:diamond_chestplate 1 0"}}",Text3:"{"text":"3.钻石护腿","color":"blue","bold":true,"underlined":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/give @p minecraft:diamond_leggings 1 0"}}",Text4:"{"text":"4.钻石靴子","color":"blue","bold":true,"underlined":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"give @p minecraft:diamond_boots 1 0"}}"},display:{Name:"Custom Sign"}}复制代码
测试版本1.11.2(其他版本应该没问题)
